metadata.description: A prefix, 3-10 alphanumeric characters without whitespace, used to prefix resources and generate uniqueness for resources with globally unique naming requirements like Storage Accounts and Log Analytics Workspaces
A suffix, 3 to 6 characters in length, to append to resource names (e.g. "dev", "test", "prod", "mlz"). It defaults to "mlz".
The region to deploy resources into. It defaults to the deployment location.
Specifies the tenant ID of a user/subscription

Specifies the object ID of a user, service principal or security group in the Azure Active Directory tenant for the vault. The object ID must be unique for the list of access policies. Get it by using Get-AzADUser or Get-AzADServicePrincipal cmdlets.
A suffix to use for naming deployments uniquely. It defaults to the Bicep resolution of the "utcNow()" function.
A string dictionary of tags to add to deployed resources. See https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-resource-manager/management/tag-resources?tabs=json#arm-templates for valid settings.
The CIDR Virtual Network Address Prefix for the Hub Virtual Network. Default value = 10.90.0.0/16
The CIDR Subnet Address Prefix for the Hub management subnet. It must be in the Hub Virtual Network space. Default value = 10.90.0.0/24
The CIDR Subnet Address Prefix for the Hub external subnet. It must be in the Hub Virtual Network space. Default value = 10.90.1.0/24
The CIDR Subnet Address Prefix for the Hub internal subnet. It must be in the Hub Virtual Network space. Default value = 10.90.2.0/24
The CIDR Subnet Address Prefix for the Hub VDMS subnet. It must be in the Hub Virtual Network space. Default value = 10.90.3.0/24
The CIDR Virtual Network Address Prefix for the Identity Virtual Network. Default value = 10.92.0.0/16
The CIDR Subnet Address Prefix for the default Identity subnet. It must be in the Identity Virtual Network space. Default value = 10.92.0.0/24
The CIDR Virtual Network Address Prefix for the Operations Virtual Network. Default value = 10.91.0.0/16
The CIDR Subnet Address Prefix for the default Operations subnet. It must be in the Operations Virtual Network space. Default value = 10.91.0.0/24
The CIDR Virtual Network Address Prefix for the Shared Services Virtual Network. Default value = 10.93.0.0/16
The CIDR Subnet Address Prefix for the default Shared Services subnet. It must be in the Shared Services Virtual Network space. Default value = 10.93.0.0/24
The administrator username for the F5 firewall appliance. It defaults to "f5admin".
[sshPublicKey/password] The authentication type for the F5 firewall appliance. It defaults to "sshPublicKey".

The administrator password or public SSH key for the F5 firewall appliance. See https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/virtual-machines/linux/faq#what-are-the-password-requirements-when-creating-a-vm- for password requirements.
The size of the F5 firewall appliance. It defaults to "Standard_DS3_v2".
The disk creation option of the F5 firewall appliance. It defaults to "FromImage".
The disk type of the F5 firewall appliance. It defaults to "Premium_LRS".
The image publisher of the F5 firewall appliance. It defaults to "f5-networks".
The image offer of the F5 firewall appliance. It defaults to "f5-big-ip-byol".
The image SKU of the F5 firewall appliance. It defaults to "f5-big-all-2slot-byol".
The image version of the F5 firewall appliance. It defaults to "15.0.100000".
[Static/Dynamic] The public IP Address allocation method for the F5 firewall appliance. It defaults to "Dynamic".
[true/false] Enable or Disable IP forwarding on a network interface resource.

An array of Network Security Group Rules to apply to the Hub Virtual Network. Default adds SSH and RDP to default rule set. See https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/templates/microsoft.network/networksecuritygroups/securityrules?tabs=bicep#securityrulepropertiesformat for valid settings.
The name of the IP configuration for the Linux remotea Access VM. It defaults to "linuxVmIpConfiguration".
The administrator username for the Linux Virtual Machine to  remote into. It defaults to "azureuser".
[sshPublicKey/password] The authentication type for the Linux Virtual Machine to remote into. It defaults to "password".

The administrator password or public SSH key for the Linux Virtual Machine to remote into. See https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/virtual-machines/linux/faq#what-are-the-password-requirements-when-creating-a-vm- for password requirements.
The size of the Linux Virtual Machine to remote into. It defaults to "Standard_DS1_v2".
The disk creation option of the Linux Virtual Machine to remote into. It defaults to "FromImage".
The disk type of the Linux Virtual Machine to remote into. It defaults to "Standard_LRS".
The image publisher of the Linux Virtual Machine to remote into. It defaults to "Canonical".
The image offer of the Linux Virtual Machine to remote into. It defaults to "UbuntuServer".
The image SKU of the Linux Virtual Machine to remote into. It defaults to "18.04-LTS".
The image version of the Linux Virtual Machine to remote into. It defaults to "latest".
[Static/Dynamic] The public IP Address allocation method for the Linux virtual machine. It defaults to "Dynamic".
The administrator username for the Windows Virtual Machine to   remote into. It defaults to "azureuser".

The administrator password the Windows Virtual Machine to  remote into. It must be > 12 characters in length. See https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/virtual-machines/windows/faq#what-are-the-password-requirements-when-creating-a-vm- for password requirements.
The size of the Windows Virtual Machine to remote into. It defaults to "Standard_DS1_v2".
The publisher of the Windows Virtual Machine to remote into. It defaults to "MicrosoftWindowsServer".
The offer of the Windows Virtual Machine to remote into. It defaults to "WindowsServer".
The SKU of the Windows Virtual Machine to remote into. It defaults to "2019-datacenter".
The version of the Windows Virtual Machine to  remote into. It defaults to "latest".
The disk creation option of the Windows Virtual Machine to  remote into. It defaults to "FromImage".
The storage account type of the Windows Virtual Machine to  remote into. It defaults to "Premium_LRS".
[Static/Dynamic] The public IP Address allocation method for the Windows virtual machine. It defaults to "Dynamic".
The NetworkInterfaceNameIpConfiguration Name for the Windows virtual machine.
Set to tru to set STIG controls on Windows VM
Url for . Example: local.azurestack.external
SKU for the vault

Specifies the permissions to keys in the vault. Valid values are: all, encrypt, decrypt, wrapKey, unwrapKey, sign, verify, get, list, create, update, import, delete, backup, restore, recover, and purge.
Specifies the permissions to secrets in the vault. Valid values are: all, get, list, set, delete, backup, restore, recover, and purge.
SKU for the vault

Specifies the permissions to keys in the vault. Valid values are: all, encrypt, decrypt, wrapKey, unwrapKey, sign, verify, get, list, create, update, import, delete, backup, restore, recover, and purge.
Specifies the permissions to secrets in the vault. Valid values are: all, get, list, set, delete, backup, restore, recover, and purge.

extSubnetId.value: [extensionResourceId(format('/subscriptions/{0}/resourceGroups/{1}', subscription().subscriptionId, variables('hubResourceGroupName')), 'Microsoft.Network/virtualNetworks/subnets', split(format('{0}/{1}', variables('hubVirtualNetworkName'), variables('extSubnetName')), '/')[0], split(format('{0}/{1}', variables('hubVirtualNetworkName'), variables('extSubnetName')), '/')[1])]

intSubnetId.value: [extensionResourceId(format('/subscriptions/{0}/resourceGroups/{1}', subscription().subscriptionId, variables('hubResourceGroupName')), 'Microsoft.Network/virtualNetworks/subnets', split(format('{0}/{1}', variables('hubVirtualNetworkName'), variables('intSubnetName')), '/')[0], split(format('{0}/{1}', variables('hubVirtualNetworkName'), variables('intSubnetName')), '/')[1])]

mgmtSubnetId.value: [extensionResourceId(format('/subscriptions/{0}/resourceGroups/{1}', subscription().subscriptionId, variables('hubResourceGroupName')), 'Microsoft.Network/virtualNetworks/subnets', split(format('{0}/{1}', variables('hubVirtualNetworkName'), variables('mgmtSubnetName')), '/')[0], split(format('{0}/{1}', variables('hubVirtualNetworkName'), variables('mgmtSubnetName')), '/')[1])]

vdmsSubnetId.value: [extensionResourceId(format('/subscriptions/{0}/resourceGroups/{1}', subscription().subscriptionId, variables('hubResourceGroupName')), 'Microsoft.Network/virtualNetworks/subnets', split(format('{0}/{1}', variables('hubVirtualNetworkName'), variables('vdmsSubnetName')), '/')[0], split(format('{0}/{1}', variables('hubVirtualNetworkName'), variables('vdmsSubnetName')), '/')[1])]

mgmtSubnetId.value: [extensionResourceId(format('/subscriptions/{0}/resourceGroups/{1}', subscription().subscriptionId, variables('hubResourceGroupName')), 'Microsoft.Network/virtualNetworks/subnets', split(format('{0}/{1}', variables('hubVirtualNetworkName'), variables('mgmtSubnetName')), '/')[0], split(format('{0}/{1}', variables('hubVirtualNetworkName'), variables('mgmtSubnetName')), '/')[1])]
